kert:test-plan.kert:description: Test plan for FTP Client XQuery extension module of eXist XMLDB

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Function list-resources(), anonymous FTP
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies the function list-resources() with an anonymous FTP connection. The evaluation of test is based on the listing of a directory having contents. If list contains something (files or directories), the test is passed.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Function retrieve-resource(), anonymous FTP, binary file
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies the function retrieve-resource() for a binary file, with an anonymous FTP connection. The evaluation of test is based on the content of the file. If the file exists and has content, the test is passed. Note that this test depends of this file; in case when that file will cease to exist on the remote host, the test has to be modified accordingly.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Function store-resource(), anonymous FTP, binary file
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies the function store-resource() for a binary file, with an anonymous FTP connection.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Function retrieve-resource(), anonymous FTP, text file
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies the function retrieve-resource() for a text file, with an anonymous FTP connection. The evaluation of test is based on the content of the file. If the file exists and has content, the test is passed. Note that this test depends of this file; in case when that file will cease to exist on server, the test has to be modified accordingly.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Function store-resource(), anonymous FTP, text file
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies the function store-resource() for a text file, with an anonymous FTP connection.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Function list-resources(), non-anonymous FTP
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies the function list-resources() with a private key SFTP connection. The evaluation of test is based on the listing of a directory. The test is considered as passed if this directory has contents. In case this content will have no contents at one moment in time, for various reasons, the test has to be modified accordingly.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Function retrieve-resource(), non-anonymous FTP, binary file
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies the function retrieve-resource() for a binary file, with a private key SFTP connection. The evaluation of test is based on the contents of the file. If the file exists and has contents, the test is passed. Note that this test depends of this file; in case when that file will cease to exist on the remote host, the test has to be modified accordingly.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Function retrieve-resource(), non-anonymous FTP, text file
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies the function retrieve-resource() for a text file, with a private key SFTP connection. The evaluation of test is based on the contents of the file. If the file exists and has contents, the test is passed. Note that this test depends of this file; in case when that file will cease to exist on server, the test has to be modified accordingly.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Function store-resource(), non-anonymous FTP, binary file
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies the function store-resource() for a binary file, with a private key SFTP connection.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Function store-resource(), non-anonymous FTP, binary file
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies the function store-resource() for a text file, with a private key SFTP connection.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Function retrieve-resource(), anonymous FTP, binary file, no rights
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies the error raising for function retrieve-resource() with a binary file having no read rigths, with an anonymous FTP connection. The evaluation of test is based on the permissions of the file. If the file exists and logged user have no read rights, the test is passed. Note that this test depends on this file; in case when that file will cease to exist on server, the test has to be modified accordingly.

kert:test.kert:author: Dan McCreary
kert:test.kert:title: Check installation of module
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies that the module is installed.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Error for list-resources(), anonymous FTP, wrong directory
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies raising of error when using the function list-resources() with an anonymous FTP connection in order to list a non-existent directory.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Error for list-resources(), non-anonymous FTP, wrong directory
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies raising of error when using the function list-resources() with a non-anonymous FTP connection in order to list a non-existent directory.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Error for list-resources(), non-anonymous FTP, no rights directory
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies raising of error when using the function list-resources() with a anonymous FTP connection in order to list a directory the user has no access.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Error for list-resources(), non-anonymous FTP, no rights directory
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies raising of error when using the function list-resources() with a non-anonymous FTP connection in order to list a directory the user has no access.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Error for retrieve-resource(), anonymous FTP, binary file, wrong name
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies the error raising for function retrieve-resource() for a wrong name of a binary file, with an anonymous FTP connection. The evaluation of test is based on the non-existence of the file name. If the file name does not exists, the test is passed. Note that this test depends on this file name; in case when that file name will start to exist on server, the test has to be modified accordingly.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Function retrieve-resource(), non-anonymous FTP, binary file, wrong name
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies the function retrieve-resource() for a wrong name of a binary file, with an non-anonymous FTP connection. The evaluation of test is based on the non-existence of the file name. If the file name does not exists, the test is passed. Note that this test depends on this file name; in case when that file name will start to exist on server, the test has to be modified accordingly.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Function retrieve-resource(), non-anonymous FTP, binary file, no rights
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies the error raising for function retrieve-resource() with a binary file having no read rigths, with a non-anonymous FTP connection. The evaluation of test is based on the permissions of the file. If the file exists and logged user have no read rights, the test is passed. Note that this test depends on this file; in case when that file will cease to exist on server, the test has to be modified accordingly.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Function store-resource(), anonymous FTP, binary file, wrong path
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies the error raising for function store-resource() for a binary file stored with a wrong path, with an anonymous FTP connection.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Function store-resource(), anonymous FTP, binary file, no rights path
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies the error raising for function store-resource() for a binary file stored with a no rights path, with an anonymous FTP connection.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Error for connection closed by server, anonymous FTP
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies the error raising for an anonymous FTP connection that is unexpectedly closed by the server. In order to simulate the closing of connection, function disconnect() in called before the function list-resources(), which raises the error.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Function delete-resource(), anonymous FTP, directory
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies the function delete-resource() for a directory, with an anonymous FTP connection. The evaluation of test is based on the existence of the directory. If the directory exists, the test is passed. Note that this test depends of this directory; in case when that directory will cease to exist on the remote host, the test has to be modified accordingly.

kert:test.kert:author: Claudius Teodorescu
kert:test.kert:title: Function delete-resource(), anonymous FTP, file
kert:test.kert:description: This test verifies the function delete-resource() for a file, with an anonymous FTP connection. The evaluation of test is based on the existence of the file. The tests generates itself a file (with store-resource()), which is afterwards deleted.
